title: Toshiko Takaezu: Ceramics
short_description: Toshiko Takaezu: Ceramics not only demonstrates the artist’s commitment to the medium’s sensuous pleasures but also marks her gift of 16 magnificent pieces donated to the Art Institute in 2006. The first exhibition devoted to Takaezu’s work at the museum in almost 50 years, it will feature nearly 20 of the artist’s ceramics from five decades of her career and representative examples by her mentors and contemporaries.
